SENT.plain: A 30-month-old twin with Beckwith-Wiedemann syndrome underwent exstirpation of a nephroblastoma from the right kidney
A Meckel's diverticulum (MD), an incidental finding intraoperatively, was resected because it was indurated and enlarged
Histologically, the MD contained ectopic gastric and pancreatic mucosa
Nesidioblastosis was identified within the pancreatic tissue
This is probably the first description of ectopic nesidioblastosis within a MD
